item.description:
Come join us for the following topics, plus pub-time afterwards!

 

  • Andy Seaborne of Epimorphics is visiting us from the UK and will be presenting on The Linked Data API: Use of linked data by web-developers
  • Howard Burrows will be presenting on SKOS, eScience, and work on using semantics to model discourse in healthcare and life sciences
  • Jochen Rau will be presenting on Publishing Linked Data Content with TYPO3. Jochen adds:

The TYPO3 Community (http://typo3.org) recently released a SPARQL Client (http://forge.typo3.org/projects/show/extension-semantic). It enables editors and content administrators to easily publish content queried from the Linked Data Cloud. In this presentation I will give a brief overview over the features of the SPARQL Client and our roadmap to turn TYPO3 into an Open-Source Semantic CMS.

Looking forward to seeing everyone on Tuesday!
item.how_to_find_us: Rm 32-D463, 4th floor, Star Conference Room, Stata Center, MIT
item.name: Cambridge Semantic Web Monthly Meetup
